trans-unit.source: Represents XML syndication content that is not intended to be displayed in a browser.
This class is used to send serialized objects or other application state data as XML.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified type and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationElementExtension"></xref>.
The type of the content, typically expressed as a MIME content type, for example application/xml or application/xml+customer.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationElementExtension"></xref> to place in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified type, object, and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> is one subtype of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer>.
If null is passed, a default instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> is instantiated.
The type of content.
The data contract extension.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> to use.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified type, object and <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref>.
The type of content.
The XML serializer extension.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> to use.
Creates a copy of the existing <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationElementExtension"></xref>.
On the send/serialization side, this property represents the XML content that must be serialized.
On the receive/deserialization side, this property is always `null`.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationElementExtension"></xref> instance.
Gets a reader from the content of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> from the content of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref>.
Reads the content of the specified type into the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref>.
On the receive/deserialization side, if the XML syndication content element is an empty XML element, then default(`TContent`) is returned.

If not, a new instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> is created and is used to deserialize the inner XML of the XML syndication content element into an instance of `TContent`.
The type of content to read.
An object of the specified type.
The input XML cannot be deserialized into the requested type.
Reads the content of the specified type into the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> using the specified serializer.
On the receive/deserialization side, if the XML syndication content element is an empty XML element, then default(`TContent`) is returned.
If not, the instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> passed in is used to deserialize the inner XML of XML syndication content element into an instance of `TContent`.
The type of content to read.
An object of the specified type.
The input XML cannot be deserialized into the requested type.
Reads the content of the specified type into the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> using the specified serializer.
On the receive/deserialization side, if the XML syndication content element is an empty XML element, then default(`TContent`) is returned.
If not, the instance of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> passed in is used to deserialize the inner XML of XML syndication content element into an instance of `TContent`.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> to use.
The type of content to read.
An object of the specified type.
The input XML cannot be deserialized into the requested type.
Gets the type of the XML syndication content.
The XML syndication content type.
Write the contents of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.

This method writes the inner XML content of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent> instance (for example, it does not write the top level start and end elements of the syndication content).
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
